title: Mini-Ep 259: Vacation Thoughts
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 259: Vacation Thoughts
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree are officially back from vacation and rested and reading very different book series. They hear from listeners about a skin care pickle, get a fresh take on what to do with old journals, and discuss how to rekindle a hidden passion for cr...
description:
Kate and Doree are officially back from vacation and rested and reading very different book series. They hear from listeners about a skin care pickle, get a fresh take on what to do with old journals, and discuss how to rekindle a hidden passion for creating. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
